docs.snippet: After age 50, runners use certain leg muscles quite differently than younger runners, a new study found. Exercises to strengthen the calf and ankle flexors may help older runners prevent injuries and increase speed....
docs.abstract: After age 50, runners use certain leg muscles quite differently than younger runners, a new study found. Exercises to strengthen the calf and ankle flexors may help older runners prevent injuries and increase speed.

headline.main: Why Runners Get Slower With Age (and How Strength Training May Help)

docs.snippet: Like the Mets’ Matt Harvey, the Yankees’ Dellin Betances has an elbow operation in his past, a pennant race in his present and no long-term contract to cover his future....
docs.lead_paragraph: Like the Mets’ Matt Harvey, the Yankees’ Dellin Betances has an elbow operation in his past, a pennant race in his present and no long-term contract to cover his future.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column says that New York Yankees pitcher Dellin Betances, like New York Mets ace Matt Harvey, is fully aware that he must rest to protect his pitching arm, even though team is in midst of playoff push.

headline.main: Across Town, Another Arm Rests for the Long Run
headline.print_headline: Across Town, Another Arm Rests for Stretch

docs.snippet: Anderson, who had to pay some change-of-travel fees, will face fifth-seeded Stan Wawrinka in the U.S. Open quarterfinals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anderson, who had to pay some change-of-travel fees, will face fifth-seeded Stan Wawrinka in the U.S. Open quarterfinals.
docs.abstract: Kevin Anderson's upset over Andy Murray in fourth round of United States Open tennis tournament moves him into first  quarterfinal of his career; Anderson's wife Kelsey says she happily paid change-of-travel fees for Anderson's coach Neville Godwin and his physical trainer Florian Zitzelsberger to stay on for next round.

headline.main: Kevin Anderson’s Breakthrough Has a Small Cost
